title: "Crimes of Passion" end credits & Perfume Genius "Too Bright" album cover
content:
I think these are the same typeface (the TV one a condensed variation), but can't work out what it is. Pretty close to Berhard Gothic and Grotesk-Pfeiler, but not quite! Any ideas? Guessing it's not a custom font if a Swedish TV production company and an American record company are both using it! Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CoP%20credits_3746.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PerfGen%20CD_5804.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PG_Queen_4336.png)

Font: 

 Neutraface 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131444/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: SBBton

comments.content: The film credits look like Neutra Condensed Medium.
Aaah, excellent! Thanks guys, much appreciated, and so quick - I love the Typophile community. :)
